## Builder.image() method

Adds an image control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
image(label: string, opts?: Partial<ImageModel>): ImageModel & Removable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  label | <code>string</code> | The control label |
|  opts | <code>Partial&lt;ImageModel&gt;</code> | Additional options for the control |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ImageModel & Removable`
